suite.id: Shared Classes CommandLineOptionTests Suite - Windows Configuration

echo.value: Running tests in mode $SCMODE$ with command line options: $currentMode$

test.id: Start : Cleanup: persistent
Start: Cleanup: nonpersistent
Test 1: Create a cache
Test 2: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is false
test.output: Cache contains only classes with line numbers

test.id: Test 2 - b: Add ROM classes to the existing shared cache without line numbers
Test 2 - c: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is false and shared cache contains classes with line numbers and without line numbers
test.output: Cache contains classes with line numbers and classes without line numbers

test.id: Test 3: Build a new cache with -Xnolinenumbers
Test 4 - a: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is true and all the content is without line numbers
test.output: Cache contains only classes without line numbers

test.id: Test 4 - b: Add ROM classes to the existing shared cache with line numbers
Test 4 - c: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is true and shared cache contains classes with line numbers and without line numbers
test.output: Cache contains classes with line numbers and classes without line numbers

test.id: Test 4 - d: Build a new cache with -Xnolinenumbers and mprotect=all
Test 4 - e: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is true and all the content is without line numbers
test.output: Cache contains only classes without line numbers

test.id: Test 4 - f: Add ROM classes to the existing shared cache with line numbers by using mprotect=all
Test 4 - g: Ensure -Xnolinenumbers is true and shared cache contains classes with line numbers and without line numbers
test.output: Cache contains classes with line numbers and classes without line numbers

test.id: Test 5: Create a cache with 500K memory and ensure vm starts successfully
Test 6s: Setup for Test 6, 7, 8 and 9
Test 6: ensure vm starts with the option -Xshareclasses:readonly
Test 7: ensure zip cache sharing works and zip cache number is not 0
Test 8: ensure zip cache info is printed in printAllStats output
Test 9: JAZZ 31723 ensure opened cached zip files are calling the VM_ZIP_LOAD hook

Test 10: JAZZ 31726 test 1 ensure -Xzero:sharebootzip creates zip caches
Test 11: JAZZ 31726 test 2 ensure -Xzero:describe shows -Xzero:sharebootzip
Test 12s: JAZZ 31726 setup for Test 12
Test 12: JAZZ 31726 test 3 ensure -Xzero:nosharebootzip doesn't create zip caches
Test 13s: JAZZ 31726 setup for Tests 13, 14 and 15
Test 13: JAZZ 31723 test 2 ensure opened non-cached zip files are calling the VM_ZIP_LOAD hook
Test 14: JAZZ 31726 test 4 ensure -Xzero:none doesn't create zip caches
Test 15: JAZZ 31726 test 5 ensure -Xzero:nosharebootzip,describe shows -Xzero:none
Test 16s: JAZZ 31726 setup for Test 16
Test 16: JAZZ 31726 test 6 ensure -Xzero creates boot zip caches
Test 17: JAZZ 31726 test 7 ensure -Xzero -Xzero:describe shows sharebootzip
